question: What are the college timings?
answer: Our college operates from 9 AM to 4 PM, Monday to Saturday.

question: How can I get my ID card?
answer: You can collect your ID card from the admin office during lunch hours.

question: Who is the head of the Computer Science department?
answer: Dr. Suresh Kumar is the current HOD of the Computer Science department.

question: Give me the list of departments?
answer:
Here are the departments available:
  • Textile
  • Computer Science
  • Mechanical
  • Civil
  • Electrical
  • Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
